WhyUs.title: Why SignalCraft?
WhyUs.description: The most reliable predictive maintenance solution, trusted by global industry leaders.

precision.title: Detect Failures Weeks Early
precision.description: From micro-fractures in bearings to abnormal wear in gearboxes, we analyze ultrasonic frequencies beyond human hearing to detect signs of failure 2-4 weeks in advance. This prevents massive equipment costs and unplanned shutdowns.

edge.title: Self-Contained Edge AI
edge.description: Secure, real-time analysis without cloud dependency. Your data stays safe within your facility.

nonInvasive.title: Zero-Downtime Setup
nonInvasive.description: Deploy in seconds with non-invasive magnetic sensors. No production stops required.

scalability.title: Seamless Scalability
scalability.description: Easily expand from a single machine to an entire plant via wireless networks. Integrates perfectly with existing ERP/MES systems.

detail.title: The Technological Edge
detail.subtitle: Discover the innovation that sets SignalCraft apart from traditional monitoring.
detail.beyondDesc: Mechanical friction creates ultrasonic waves (20kHz+) long before visible vibration damages occur. SignalCraft's sensors capture this early warning signal, giving you weeks of lead time instead of hours.
detail.edgeDesc: We don't just send raw data to the cloud. Our proprietary neural engine runs directly on the gateway, filtering out background noise and extracting key insights. This ensures ultra-low latency and maximum data security.

installation.q: Do I need to stop production to install?
installation.a: No. Our magnetic sensors attach to the exterior of your equipment in seconds. No drilling or wiring is required, allowing for zero-downtime deployment.

accuracy.q: How accurate is the diagnostic AI?
accuracy.a: SignalCraft maintains 99% + accuracy. Our models specifically filter for high-frequency acoustic signatures of failure, ignoring common background factory noise.

security.a: Yes. All audio analysis is performed on-site at the edge. Only processed diagnostic results are sent to the dashboard, ensuring raw audio never leaves your facility.

environment.q: Does it work in high-noise environments?
environment.a: Absolutely. By focusing on ultrasonic frequencies physically separate from common industrial noise, we detect machine health regardless of ambient sound levels.
